item.title: Fermi’s first tenant of massive Trump-named power project backs out of funding deal
item.description: Fermi, co-founded by a former secretary of energy, Rick Perry, said its first potential tenant of Project Matador has backed out of an agreement to pr...

item.title: Why Alphabet and Amazon could be two of the best AI stocks next year
item.description: As AI spending rises, these two Big Tech names will be best-positioned to deliver a return on investment, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: A squash game saved this famous trader’s life. Here’s how he learned he had breast cancer.
item.description: The investor Steve Eisman said he has breast cancer and is undergoing treatment for the disease, which is diagnosed in fewer than 1% of men.

item.title: ‘Inflation remains too high.’ Two Fed dissenters who rejected latest interest-rate cut explain why.
item.description: The Fed could have waited for delayed economic reports on inflation and employment, Chicago Federal Reserve Bank President Austan Goolsbee said.

item.title: Bezos and Musk target AI through space. These Earthly stocks could benefit.
item.description: The investing edge is spotting where capital for orbital AI goes first, says Matthew Tuttle
